Text: RAC Website Portfolio Tracking Systemthe month of June RAC will begin the rollout of our new website and linked portfolio tracking system called PortRAC The website will provide the user with instantly available transaction policies procedures DASH s and other valuable reports and links The PortRAC system is an extensive database of merchant and strategic investment information combined with a powerful search engine and report writer PortRAC will enable the analysis of our investment portfolio in any fashion that the user specifies such as the calculation of returns for a particular industry or region I believe that the new RAC website and PortRAC system will be valuable tool s to help manage our business and I would like to provide you a personal demo before we introduce these applications to a broader population In the next two weeks Rick Carson will be contacting you to arrange a convenient time for the demo which should take about minutes I hope that you will be able to make time in your schedule Please call me with any questions Rick Buy

RAC Holiday Coverage Cc be out of the office the week between Christmas and New Years and can be contacted by telephone and fax Please make certain that there is coverage at all times for your area Also please send Karen your own schedule Rick
RAC Bonuseswill be working on all RAC bonuses on Wednesday and ask that each of you review your departments bonuses on Thursday so that all of RAC can be submitted on Friday Thanks Rick

Info Central Space Cc Kitchen who is now the President CEO of Enron Net Works and I had a conversation about the space located at EB Louise had no objection to RAC occupying this space since her buildout could not occur until May The space rental should be allocated to and equally Rick
